entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. 30 percent chance of wet flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
